headline.print_headline: Big Chains Benefit From City Tax Incentives but Don’t Create Jobs, a Report Says
headline.main: Big Chains Benefit From City Tax Incentives but Don’t Create Jobs, a Report Says

docs.lead_paragraph: The report says many businesses have not used tax incentives to create jobs, but have simply displaced independent enterprises.
docs.snippet: The report says many businesses have not used tax incentives to create jobs, but have simply displaced independent enterprises.
